newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia Duma urges wide ban on foreign investment.
newsitem.headline: Russia Duma urges wide ban on foreign investment.

text.p: Russia's State Duma lower house of parliament, in a first reading on Friday, passed amendments to the law on foreign investment which call for a ban on foreign investment in many sectors of the economy including telecommunications and electrical power distribution.

Before the amendments become law the Duma must pass them in a total of three readings. They would also require approval by the Federation Council upper house and President Boris Yeltsin before taking effect.
